item.title: Fintech Wealthfront To Offer Lower-Rate Home Mortgages
item.description: The Silicon Valley robo-advisor, which has 1.3 million customers, is expanding into home lending as it also tries to go public.

item.title: Jeff Bezos Is Backing An AI Startup Aiming To Make Proteins Programmable
item.description: Profluent has raised $106 million to scale up use of its AI models for biology in drug development and agriculture.
